segments.text: I see the girl standing there with her hand out, waiting for a cookie like it’s the best thing ever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s so patient, just watching her brother risk everything for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s smarter than him, standing safely on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going for it, stretching so high he might fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before and gotten away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely clueless about the chaos behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t turned around yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still overflowing, and the floor is getting more slippery by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she notices soon, before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is so calm, like she knows exactly what she’s doing.
segments.speaker: PAR
